DOC.criteria: Over 50 year age White Matter Hyperintensities MRI @ symptom and/or neurological impairment e.g . gait disturbance , disequilibrium , decline cognitive function , upper motor neuron deficit , dysmetria , hyperrefexia unilateral increase motor tone Contraindications hyperbaric oxygen therapy e.g . pulmonary emphysema bulla , claustrophobiia , seizure diorder Inability patient tolerate pressurization e.g . Eustachian tube dysfunction Stroke within previous 6 month Extreme cognitive impairment Major depression Other uncontrolled comorbidities , e.g . diabetes , hypertension , thyroid disorder , carotid artery stenosis ( > 70 % ) , renal hepatic dysfunction History brain tumor , head trauma , electric shock therapy , brain irradiation History migraine headache
